title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water. Fry pancetta until crispy. Whisk eggs with cheese. Drain pasta, mix with pancetta, then add egg mixture off heat. Season with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill or bake chicken. Sauté onion and tomatoes, add spices, then chicken and cream. Simmer until cooked.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy mix of fresh vegetables sautéed in a savory sauce.
instructions: Chop vegetables. Heat oil, add garlic, then vegetables. Stir fry for 5-7 minutes. Add soy sauce and serve.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Crispy taco shells filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
instructions: Cook beef with seasoning. Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A fresh salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing, add croutons and cheese.
